analysis.description:
CryptonCoin.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#184-219) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < preIcoFinishTimestamp (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#191-219)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < fundingEndTime) (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#186-188)

CryptonCoin.createTokensForCrypton (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#224-243) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > finalTokensIssueTime (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#228-243)

CryptonCoin.stopIco (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#243-250) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > fundingEndTime (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#245-250)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol:

Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/28/0x971fdec17b5f70d98d3a1017034499cf7172d9b4.sol#121) is not in mixedCase
